TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OleDbType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the data type of a field, a property, for use in an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The preceding table shows mappings between OleDbType data types, OLE DB data types (shown in parentheses), and the .NET Framework types. The OleDbType data types accept `System.Char[]`as `Parameter.Value` in parameterized queries.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType BigInt = int32(20)

Docs.summary: A 64-bit signed integer (DBTYPE_I8). This maps to <xref:System.Int64>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Binary = int32(128)

Docs.summary: A stream of binary data (DBTYPE_BYTES). This maps to an <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Byte>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Boolean = int32(11)

Docs.summary: A Boolean value (DBTYPE_BOOL). This maps to <xref:System.Boolean>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType BSTR = int32(8)

Docs.summary: A null-terminated character string of Unicode characters (DBTYPE_BSTR). This maps to <xref:System.String>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Char = int32(129)

Docs.summary: A character string (DBTYPE_STR). This maps to <xref:System.String>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Currency = int32(6)

Docs.summary: A currency value ranging from -2 63 (or -922,337,203,685,477.5808) to 2 63 -1 (or +922,337,203,685,477.5807) with an accuracy to a ten-thousandth of a currency unit (DBTYPE_CY). This maps to <xref:System.Decimal>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Date = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Date data, stored as a double (DBTYPE_DATE). The whole portion is the number of days since December 30, 1899, and the fractional portion is a fraction of a day. This maps to <xref:System.DateTime>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType DBDate = int32(133)

Docs.summary: Date data in the format *yyyymmdd* (DBTYPE_DBDATE). This maps to <xref:System.DateTime>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType DBTime = int32(134)

Docs.summary: Time data in the format *hhmmss* (DBTYPE_DBTIME). This maps to <xref:System.TimeSpan>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType DBTimeStamp = int32(135)

Docs.summary: Data and time data in the format *yyyymmddhhmmss* (DBTYPE_DBTIMESTAMP). This maps to <xref:System.DateTime>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Decimal = int32(14)

Docs.summary: A fixed precision and scale numeric value between -10 38 -1 and 10 38 -1 (DBTYPE_DECIMAL). This maps to <xref:System.Decimal>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Double = int32(5)

Docs.summary: A floating-point number within the range of -1.79E +308 through 1.79E +308 (DBTYPE_R8). This maps to <xref:System.Double>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Empty = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No value (DBTYPE_EMPTY).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Error = int32(10)

Docs.summary: A 32-bit error code (DBTYPE_ERROR). This maps to <xref:System.Exception>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Filetime = int32(64)

Docs.summary: A 64-bit unsigned integer representing the number of 100-nanosecond intervals since January 1, 1601 (DBTYPE_FILETIME). This maps to <xref:System.DateTime>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Guid = int32(72)

Docs.summary: A globally unique identifier (or GUID) (DBTYPE_GUID). This maps to <xref:System.Guid>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType IDispatch = int32(9)

Docs.summary: A pointer to an interface (DBTYPE_IDISPATCH). This maps to <xref:System.Object>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This data type is not currently supported by ADO.NET. Usage may cause unpredictable results.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Integer = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A 32-bit signed integer (DBTYPE_I4). This maps to <xref:System.Int32>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType IUnknown = int32(13)

Docs.summary: A pointer to an interface (DBTYPE_UNKNOWN). This maps to <xref:System.Object>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This data type is not currently supported by ADO.NET. Usage may cause unpredictable results.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType LongVarBinary = int32(205)

Docs.summary: A long binary value ( only). This maps to an <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Byte>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType LongVarChar = int32(201)

Docs.summary: A long string value ( only). This maps to <xref:System.String>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType LongVarWChar = int32(203)

Docs.summary: A long null-terminated Unicode string value ( only). This maps to <xref:System.String>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Numeric = int32(131)

Docs.summary: An exact numeric value with a fixed precision and scale (DBTYPE_NUMERIC). This maps to <xref:System.Decimal>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType PropVariant = int32(138)

Docs.summary: An automation PROPVARIANT (DBTYPE_PROP_VARIANT). This maps to <xref:System.Object>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Single = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A floating-point number within the range of -3.40E +38 through 3.40E +38 (DBTYPE_R4). This maps to <xref:System.Single>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType SmallInt = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A 16-bit signed integer (DBTYPE_I2). This maps to <xref:System.Int16>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType TinyInt = int32(16)

Docs.summary: A 8-bit signed integer (DBTYPE_I1). This maps to <xref:System.SByte>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType UnsignedBigInt = int32(21)

Docs.summary: A 64-bit unsigned integer (DBTYPE_UI8). This maps to <xref:System.UInt64>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType UnsignedInt = int32(19)

Docs.summary: A 32-bit unsigned integer (DBTYPE_UI4). This maps to <xref:System.UInt32>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType UnsignedSmallInt = int32(18)

Docs.summary: A 16-bit unsigned integer (DBTYPE_UI2). This maps to <xref:System.UInt16>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType UnsignedTinyInt = int32(17)

Docs.summary: A 8-bit unsigned integer (DBTYPE_UI1). This maps to <xref:System.Byte>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType VarBinary = int32(204)

Docs.summary: A variable-length stream of binary data ( only). This maps to an <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Byte>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType VarChar = int32(200)

Docs.summary: A variable-length stream of non-Unicode characters ( only). This maps to <xref:System.String>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Variant = int32(12)

Docs.summary: A special data type that can contain numeric, string, binary, or date data, and also the special values Empty and Null (DBTYPE_VARIANT). This type is assumed if no other is specified. This maps to <xref:System.Object>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType VarNumeric = int32(139)

Docs.summary: A variable-length numeric value ( only). This maps to <xref:System.Decimal>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType VarWChar = int32(202)

Docs.summary: A variable-length, null-terminated stream of Unicode characters ( only). This maps to <xref:System.String>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType WChar = int32(130)

Docs.summary: A null-terminated stream of Unicode characters (DBTYPE_WSTR). This maps to <xref:System.String>.
